attributes.action: Stop giving illegal drugs to prisoners
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is rediculous that drug users should be able to continue their addiction whilst in prison & expect us to pay for it. Surely it would be better for everyone concerned if steps were taken to break the habit so that they are no longer addicts when they are realeased therefore removing one of the reasons for the original criminal behaviour.
